 What SG1 wants -- (spoilers 615 - Sight Unseen)

Well,

i watched sight unseen, the 15th episode of season 6 and that got me thinking a bit. Well... it still appears that Jonas is frustrated with the way Jack treats him. And in every episode since Redemption, there has been some kind of reference to how much Jonas has studied in the SGC. Its like the guys been there for like 13 eps, and already the writers make him into this guy, who knows all...
"considering that i've read every book in the base library twice..." -- Jonas

And Jonas has also started to translate stuff from other languages... perfect replacement for Daniel i might add...

Teal'c has loosed up a bit... he seems more human now... his face has lost the stiffness that it had, and he has started to transform a bit... for the good or bad... that i am unsure of...

Then comes Jack and Sam... well... again in this episode... Jack asked Sam to accompany him to his fishing trip. And as usual... Sam had something else to do... the situation goes like:

*Jack and Sam walking towards the elevators*
Jack : You could come with...
Sam: Sir? (confused)
Jack: Fishing Carter, I'm going fishing.
Sam: You know i'm planning on studying the artifact...
Jack: Yessss.... (lets out a soft sigh)... its always something isnt it...?
Sam: Oh come on Sir, we both know the only reason you asked is because you know i have something else to do...
Jack : (kinda confused/sad/trying to hide his feelings) No really, i think you should come, fishhh.... (as the elevator doors close) ... fish some more....


So? ... wut does that tell u.....

got me there... but maybe the buildup to season 7 might have already started...


Your thoughts

i think i left a few things out...

Jonas might just bring in a bit of humour into the show... a little more goofyness than what Jack can generate... that was evident in the scene where Sam and Jonas were talking to the mother of the petrol pump guy... anyways... *NEWS* for any of the Sam/Jack shippers.... Jonas did hold Sam's hand and pretend to be her husband in that scene...
and, Sam does kinda show an interest in Jonas, which might just be as a friend, sister... or maybe... i dunno

think wut u will....

Dunno, I'm having difficulty working out the point of the thread...? Enjoying the shipper baiting though
Does What SG1 wants refer to the team or the show mehzeb? If it's the first, I think it's obvious Jonas wants to be accepted and respected, but wants to gain their trust without treading on other peoples toes - else he'd have said something to them for thinking he was insane. Teal'c would want freedom for his people Jack ermmm wants Daniel back, and Sam would wants a boyfriend other than Jack *nods*
